description.@en: Like an ancient creature of the world, you are particularly susceptible to certain metals and Magicks. Eventually, you will become victim to it in ways that are worse than death, dragged onto all fours as the animal you worship.

effect.@en: Whenever you are struck by weapons wrought from Cold Iron or Mithril and those which have been imbued with Magick, you suffer an additional 3 Damage. In addition, whenever you gain 1 permanent Chaos Rank, a Disorder or Malignancy, you also permanently suffer a -1 penalty to Encumbrance. Should your Encumbrance permanently reach zero, you are immediately Slain!, turned entirely into the spirit you worship.
